import React, { useState } from 'react' import './about.css' const About = () => { const [state,setState] = useState({ critic:false, pCo:false, first:"", last:"" }); const [user,setUser] = useState('react'); function handleChange(e) { setUser(e.target.value); }; /* basic() { this.setState({ critic:false, pCo:false }); } pCo() { this.setState({ critic:false, pCo:true }); } critic() { this.setState({ critic:true, pCo:false }); alert(this.state.firstName); } nameChange(event) { this.setState({event..:event.target.value}); }*/ return (
setState({...state, first: ev.target.value})} placeholder="First Name.." type="text" />
{ this.state.user? :null } { this.state.user? :null }
) } export default About
